input

Class Mouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • input.Mouse

  • public class Mouse
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to receive input from the mouse. The appearance of the mouse can be changed too.
    Author:
    jafi2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Mouse.CursorMode
      Available modes for the cursor disabled - the cursor is invisible and grabbed inside the window providing virtual and unlimited cursor movement hidden - the cursor is invisible as long as the cursor is above the window normal - the default cursor behavior
      static class  Mouse.MouseListener
      Class for listening to mouse button and scroll input
      static class  Mouse.MouseMotionListener
      Class for listening to mouse movement

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(long window)
        Initializes the Mouse input
        this class should not be used without calling this method first
        Parameters:
        window - the id of the openGL window

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Clears up the mouse listeners and releases the mouse callbacks

      • x

        public static double x(int playerID)
        Returns the x position of the Mouse relative to the window for the given player
        Parameters:
        playerID - the id of the player who's input should by used
        use Mouse.LOCAL for local input
        Returns:
        the x position of the Mouse relative to the window

        @Deprecated
public static void setCursorPos(double x,
                                             double y,
                                             int playerID)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the position of the mouse for the given player
        Parameters:
        x - the new x position of the mouse
        y - the new y position of the mouse
        playerID - the id of the player who's mouse should be moved
        use Mouse.LOCAL for local input

      • setCursorMode

public static void setCursorMode(Mouse.CursorMode cm,
                                              int playerID)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the visibility mode of the cursor (disabled, hidden, normal)
        Parameters:
        cm - the new mode of the cursor
        playerID - the id of the player who's mouse should be modified
        use Mouse.LOCAL for local input

        modifiers - the modifier keys used

                             double dy,
                             int playerID)
        Runs the onMove event for the given player
        Parameters:
        dx - the number of pixels moved in the x direction
        dy - the number of pixels moved in the y direction
        playerID - the id of the player

      • removeMouseMotionListener

        public static boolean removeMouseMotionListener(Mouse.MouseMotionListener mm,
                                                int playerID)
        Removes the given mouse motion listener for the given player
        Parameters:
        mm - the mouse motion listener
        playerID - the id of the player
        use Mouse.LOCAL for local input
        Returns:
        did the listener get removed
        Also returns false if the listener was not found
